ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] A run of luck
ygData.msgSnippet: ok it s not that light a gray, it is definitely darker than that.  i don t want to say charcoal gray, cause i think charred is closer to charcoal gray than is
ygData.messageBody:
ok it's not that light a gray, it is definitely darker than that. i don't
want to say charcoal gray, cause i think charred is closer to charcoal gray
than is black. but it is in between black and gray. rune etched is a lot
lighter than the granite bracer. the bracer is definitely not black, though
it's as close as you will get. and as far as rarity, i don't know but i've
only seen one ever hehe.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L48 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> boooo. gray is for shamans <g>
>
> I want to blend into the night, and fly past people.
>
> Harm.
>
